## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATBPM1, BPM1</u>
- **Gene Name:** BTB-POZ AND MATH DOMAIN 1, BTB-POZ and MATH domain 1
- **Description:**   BTB-POZ and MATH domain 1;(source:Araport11)
